parameters.name: GroupByKey
parameters.description:
The dimension by which resources are queried.

> If you do not specify a dimension, no results are returned.

Valid values:

*   ResourceGroupId
*   ResourceType

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The resource group ID.

You can call the [ListResourceGroups](~~2716558~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: ResourceRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resources.
